mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BOARD ( BOARD_NO, BOARD_TYPE_CODE, TITLE, CONTENT, MAJOR_YN, MAJOR_PERIOD_DATE, REG_DATETIME, REG_ID ) VALUES ( #{board_no}, #{board_type_code}, #{title}, #{content}, #{major_yn, jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{major_period_date, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reg_datetime}, #{reg_id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BOARD SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, MAJOR_YN = #{major_yn, jdbcType=TINYINT}, MAJOR_PERIOD_DATE = #{major_period_date, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPD_DATETIME = #{upd_datetime}, UPD_ID = #{upd_id} WHERE BOARD_NO = #{board_no}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TB_BOARD.BOARD_NO, TB_BOARD.TITLE, TB_BOARD.CONTENT, TB_BOARD.MAJOR_YN, TB_BOARD.MAJOR_PERIOD_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(TB_BOARD.REG_DATETIME, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DATETIME, TB_BOARD.REG_ID, TB_MEMBER.NAME AS WRITER FROM TB_BOARD INNER JOIN TB_MEMBER ON TB_BOARD.REG_ID = TB_MEMBER.MEMBER_NO WHERE MAJOR_PERIOD_DATE >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d') ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC LIMIT 10000 ) A UNION SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TB_BOARD.BOARD_NO, TB_BOARD.TITLE, TB_BOARD.CONTENT, TB_BOARD.MAJOR_YN, TB_BOARD.MAJOR_PERIOD_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(TB_BOARD.REG_DATETIME, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DATETIME, TB_BOARD.REG_ID, TB_MEMBER.NAME AS WRITER FROM TB_BOARD INNER JOIN TB_MEMBER ON TB_BOARD.REG_ID = TB_MEMBER.MEMBER_NO WHERE (MAJOR_PERIOD_DATE < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d')) OR (MAJOR_PERIOD_DATE = '') ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC LIMIT 10000 ) B

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM TB_BOARD WHERE MAJOR_PERIOD_DATE >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d') ORDER BY REG_DATETIME DESC LIMIT 10000 ) A UNION SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM TB_BOARD WHERE (MAJOR_PERIOD_DATE < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d')) OR (MAJOR_PERIOD_DATE = '') ORDER BY REG_DATETIME DESC LIMIT 10000 ) B LIMIT 4
